description.title: Smooth and seamless. The edge of design.
text: Apple Watch Series 8 features a big, brilliant Always-On display. Narrow borders push the screen right to the edge, resulting in an elegant integration with the curvature of the case.

description.title: Always-On Retina display. Take it all in. Get it all done.
text: The bright Always-On screen makes detailed watch faces look stunning and easy to read, even when your wrist is down.
The large display accommodates all your favorite complications and makes tapping, typing, and swiping a snap.

description.title: Here's to a healthier you.
text: The more informed you are about your health, the more empowered you are to affect it. Advanced health sensors in Apple Watch Series 8 provide insights to help you better understand your health.

description.title: Fast is fashionable.
text: Powerful sensors for insights about your health and fitness.
A faster dual-core processor for added performance. Apple Watch SE is feature packed, and it's a better value than ever.

description.title: Crash Detection.
text: A safety feature we hope you'll never need.
Innovative safety features. Convenient ways to stay connected.

description.title: Overview
text: Apple Pencil (2nd generation) delivers pixel-perfect precision and industry-leading low latency, making it great for drawing, sketching, coloring, taking notes, marking up PDFs, and more. And it's as easy and natural to use as a pencil.
Designed for iPad Pro, iPad Air, and iPad mini, it features a flat edge that attaches magnetically for automatic charging and pairing.

description.title: Tech Specs
text: Length: 6.53 inches (166 mm). Diameter: 0.35 inch (8.9 mm). Weight: 0.73 ounce (20.7 grams)
Conntection: Bluetooth

description.title: What's in the Box
text: Apple Pencil (2nd generation)

description.title: Introducing AirPods Max
text: Perfect balance of exhilarating high-fidelity audio and the effortless magic of AirPods.
The ultimate personal listening experience is here.

description.title: Sounds like an epiphany.
text: AirPods Max combine high-fidelity audio with industry-leading Active Noise Cancellation to deliver an unparalleled listening experience.

Each part of their custom-built driver works to produce sound with ultra-low distortion across the audible range. From deep, rich bass to accurate mids and crisp, clean highs, you'll hear every note with a new sense of clarity.

description.title: Elaborately simple.
text: AirPods Max inherit all of the wireless, effortless magic of the AirPods family. From setup to Siri commands, they make the listening experience completely fluid — day to day, device to device.
